title: ‘Ernest Jones lost my family heirloom necklace. I don’t want its cheap replacement’
text:
Has a company treated you unfairly? Our consumer champion, Katie Morley, is here to help. For how to contact her click here.

Dear Katie,

I’m writing to you out of extreme frustration with Ernest Jones, the high street jeweller. I took an 18-carat rose gold chain to my local branch to have the clasp repaired. Staff took photos of it, which were stored with my contact details, and I was told I could pick it up soon. But Ernest Jones has lost it.

This has been a devastating blow, as the necklace has been in my family for generations and was given to me on my 18th birthday. It is worth £1,650.
